features.question: What features does this project include?
features.answer: This is a complete Next.js starter template with internationalization support, theme switching, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui components, and other modern web development best practices. It provides a solid foundation for quickly building high-quality applications.

i18n.question: How do I add support for a new language?
i18n.answer: Adding a new language is straightforward. Simply create a new language file in the i18n/messages directory and add the language configuration in i18n/routing.ts. The project uses next-intl for internationalization management, supporting complex translation scenarios.

support.question: Where can I get help?
support.answer: We provide detailed documentation and example code. If you encounter any issues, you can raise them on GitHub or join our community for assistance. We are committed to providing the best support for developers.
